note.p: Merchant. London-based merchant who traded with West Africa. Sponsored William Winwood Reade’s explorations of the Niger region in 1868–70. Fellow of the Royal Geographical Society.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/922/53/17)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1995 (Ancestry.com, accessed 21 May 2020)

p.hi: London, England, Church of England births and baptisms, 1813–1917
